name: Explore & Conquer
description:
Explore & Conquer is a real-time strategy game that draws inspiration from classic RTS games from the 90´s such as "Dune 2" and "Command and Conquer - Tiberian sun". Gameplay consists of resource collection/management, exploration, and warfare. The Player finds himself in an unknown world on an island separated by water from surrounding islands. By collecting resources the player can build bridges to these islands and thus make more resources and territory available for conquering. Furthermore, the player can build military units to fight hostile units defending the mentioned resources. 

Enjoy :) and feel free to leave feedback & wishes.
